reviewText: This movie presents a strong about about life and how our actions have an ultimate impact on others. I thought it would be a religious movie, but there is no religious themes in it but a more common humanitarian theme. The main character of the movie stars as an angel (Molly), who try to get others to see how life is in other people's shoes and how others lives are not as simple as we make it out to be.A great movie for children today. Highly recommended for all audiences!
summary: Great Movie with a strong message about life

reviewText: This movie is really touching and teaches us to watch how we judge people because our judgments are usually not right! If we put ourselves in their shoes we find that their life isn't what we thought it was. A really cute, clean movie that touches your heart!

reviewerName: Penny Zeller, Christian Author and Speaker
reviewText: Our family watched this movie last week and thoroughly enjoyed it! This movie takes a look into the lives of two different families and reiterates the importance of not judging others, as found in Matthew 7:1.The acting in A Walk in My Shoes was strong and believable and the characters likeable. We also enjoyed the upbeat music throughout. The important lessons learned in this movie gave us good discussion starters. "Molly" in the movie was a little bit odd, but still likeable. I would highly recommend this movie, which contained no objectional material. A big kuddos to Walmart for creating and developing wholesome family movies! I have added A Walk in My Shoes to my Mom-Approved movie listing on my wordpress blog.Reviewed by Penny Zeller, author of the historical romance novel "Hailee."
summary: Thank you Walmart for another great movie!

reviewText: I was pleasantly surprised by the emotional depth of this movie.  It's not exactly a tear-jerker but it definitely shows how easy it is to judge the actions of someone when you don't understand what's happening in that person's life.  I've been looking for movies that I'm not ashamed to watch with my children and this is a good choice.  The characters are engaging and the acting is very good.  The story is well-written.  Highly recommended.
